tns:patch.author: mihai
tns:patch.description: Add the ability to configure the number of locations to show icons on the Project Sites map

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_global_settings (id, settingsname, settingsvalue, possiblevalues, description, section) VALUES (nextval('amp_global_settings_seq'), 'Show icons for Project Sites for locations up to', '0', 't_Integer', 'If 0 then it will show colored points, otherwise it will set the upper limit (for the number of locations) to show icons (if lower) or points (if higher).', 'general');
